page.title: 05LAW AND ORDER
page.content: The police patrol regularly,keeping the peace,and making sure that law and order is kept.Mugging,shoplifting, rape,arson,prostitution,burgularies, theft,lost or stolen property, vandalism and violence etc,are all delt with and corrected by the police who patrol on foot,motorbikes,cars and sometimes on horseback. Parking laws are kept by the Traffic Wardens.They patrol on foot and make sure no-one parks on yellow lines;corners,bends,or any other dangerous place on roads.They also make sure that no-one parks their vehicle by a parking meter without paying.It costs,Monday to Saturday,10 pence for half an hour.On Sundays and Bank Holidays we can park free of charge. By Joanne Ford
